formattedAddress: Rubin Residence Hall, 41 5th Ave #1c, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: Rubin Residence Hall, 41 5th Ave #1c, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I loved going to Manhattan Rehabilitation Services for physical therapy for my ankle. All of the staff are so nice and friendly. Maria, my physical therapist, truly knows what she is doing. She is patient and answered my many questions. She makes friendly conversation and distracts you during sometimes painful exercises.

They truly get to know you and you build relationships with them. You never have to re-explain your condition or what you need help with. I highly recommend their services!

text.text:

She is patient and answered my many questions. She makes friendly conversation and distracts you during sometimes painful exercises.

They truly get to know you and you build relationships with them. You never have to re-explain your condition or what you need help with. I highly recommend their services!

originalText.text: Everyone at Manhattan Rehabilitation is great. I've been to quite a few different PT offices and these guys are my favorite by far. I had my eval with Jet and he was very attentive to detail, listened to what I had to say and took notes. I'm having two different injuries treated there with Sarah. She's wonderful. After three months in another office working on my back with no results, Sarah and Amy (the massage therapist) have been able to finally get results. Aside from their professional aptitude, the people in this office are a pleasure to be around, and treat you like a real person, not just another patient (which is important when you have to see them a few times a week). I highly recommend this practice!

originalText.text: My overall experience at MRS is great! Vanessa is very pleasant to deal with @ the front desk. Sarah and Jet are great therapist who are trying their best at speeding up my recovery. Ruby is always so helpful  with guiding me through my exercises and Amy's massages help a lot. Thanks everyone for making me feel better. Love the professionalism and the TLC I receive!!!

Ruby is always so helpful  with guiding me through my exercises and Amy's massages help a lot. Thanks everyone for making me feel better. Love the professionalism and the TLC I receive!!!

originalText.text: Manhattan Rehabilitation Services is great! They were able to schedule me in for an appointment right away and the entire staff was very caring for all of my needs. They are very professional, and took their time in assessing my condition and next steps for treatment. Everyone in the office was very friendly and made the experience much more enjoyable than other places I have been before for the same injury.

They are very professional, and took their time in assessing my condition and next steps for treatment. Everyone in the office was very friendly and made the experience much more enjoyable than other places I have been before for the same injury.

originalText.text:
I have been going to Manhattan Rehabilitation Services PT for a number of years and am very happy with the  care I get there. Carol is my physical therapist and I couldn't be more pleased. She is extremely knowledgeable and capable. Under her care my foot has become manageable and the orthotics she fitted me for enable me to walk relatively pain free. She and  Ruby have given me exercises to do at home and I am diligent in doing them.

Thank you Manhattan Rehabilitation Services!
